## arrToObj() function

将数组转换为对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function arrToObj<T extends Array<string | number>, V = boolean>(arr: T, v?: boolean): TupleToObject<T, V>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arr | T | 数组 |
|  v | boolean | _(Optional)_ 对象每一项的值 |

**Returns:**

TupleToObject&lt;T, V&gt;

对象
